All you need to do is a read the username when the command is entered, get the player for that username, and then set their pkpoints to x.

item.title: Pkpoint removal code
item.dc:creator: @nath22 nath22
item.description:
@nath22 wrote:

if i find someone pkboosting i want to make there pkpoints -1000 as a punishment but right now this would only work for the user using the command how do i make it so takes there pkpoints away instead of mine

if(command.startsWith("removepkpoints") && playerRights >= 1) {
if(pkPoints>0)
{
pkPoints = 0;
pkPoints -= 1000;
}else{
pkPoints -= 1000;
}

Read full topic
